Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor and the Undersea Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Duke O'Dowd as the Human Meteor and his initial encounters with a suspicious sedan, leading him to uncover an undersea plot involving a sunken Japanese submarine and a dangerous operation.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Initial Taxi Job
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Human Meteor and Duke's taxi driver persona, setting up his initial encounter with suspicious playboys.

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Sedan Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into the Human Meteor to investigate a suspicious sedan, leading to a confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Suspicious Sedan and the Human Meteor's Emergence

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Stowaway Plan and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans to stowaway on a yacht to investigate further, enlisting Toby's help, but Toby is quickly discovered.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Intrigue and Pete's Peril
sub_scenes.description: Pete uncovers a suspicious chart on the yacht and is thrown overboard. Duke observes from afar and senses danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Pete's Yacht Duty and Suspicious Chart
Duke's Observation and Toby's Confirmed Action

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Investigation and Submarine Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor dives underwater to investigate and discovers a sunken Japanese submarine, uncovering a secret torpedo loading operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Rush and Pete's Rescue
Discovery of the Sunken Japanese Submarine
Inside the Submarine: Torpedo Loading Operation

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Conflict and Surface Attack
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor is ambushed underwater, escapes, and then faces gunfire from the surface.

narrative_arcs.title: Surface Attack and Plea for Help

sub_scenes.title: Counter-Attack and Ship's Demise
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor retaliates with a torpedo, while on the surface, Peter's condition and the ship's reaction are shown.

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Revelation of Peter's Treachery
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor investigates Peter's cabin, discovers a depth map, and learns about Peter's connection to the 'Jar Navy'.

narrative_arcs.title: Depth Map Discovery in Peter's Cabin

sub_scenes.title: Toby and Holden's Rescue and Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor rescues Toby and Holden, and they recover in the hospital, concluding with a hopeful drive home.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Drive Home and Future Growth
Bedtime and Anticipation of New Adventures

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Spies and the Ambulance Emergency
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features the Liberty Lads confronting Nazis and introduces a separate storyline involving two boys, an ambulance, and a wallet, which intertwines with a Nazi spy plot.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: The Liberty Lads engage in a standoff with Nazis.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Wallet Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Boys observe an ambulance and find a dropped wallet, leading them to the bus garage.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Arrival and Injured Person at the House

sub_scenes.title: Intrigue at the Bus Garage
sub_scenes.description: Boys arrive at the garage and witness a marine saluting a civilian, Major Bronson, sparking their curiosity.

sub_scenes.title: Ambush and Capture at the Garage
sub_scenes.description: Boys attempt to return the wallet at the garage but are ambushed and captured by Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Approaching the Garage to Return the Wallet

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Violent Threat
sub_scenes.description: Boys are interrogated about the wallet, and Mr. Horst threatens to harm them.

narrative_arcs.title: Questioning and Suspicion about the Wallet
Wallet Examination and Discovery of Address

sub_scenes.title: Major Bronson's Intervention and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Major Bronson intervenes, seemingly to help, but proposes a sinister carbon monoxide poisoning plan.

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Marine Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Boys are attacked, but Major Bronson suddenly turns against Horst's men, helping the boys escape and leading to marine intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help
Nazi Rats' Taunt and Marine Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and the Kidnapped President's Daughter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and Henry as they become entangled in the kidnapping of President Rosita's daughter by El Tigre, leading to a rescue mission in South America.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ and Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to The Champ and Henry and their fight against Nazi agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission

sub_scenes.title: Suspicion and Interrogation in South America
sub_scenes.description: The Champ and Henry are suspected and interrogated by local officers in a South American town due to Rosita's kidnapping.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery in South American Town and Impending Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Plan and Forced Assistance
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre's scheme is revealed, and the men are forced to help Rosita's mother, leading to a rescue plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Car Ride and Arrival at Rosita's Mother's House
Plea for Help and Intelligence from Rosita's Mother

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Confrontation with El Tigre
sub_scenes.description: The men infiltrate El Tigre's hideout, use a diversion, and confront El Tigre directly.

narrative_arcs.title: Sneaking into El Tigre's Hideout and Planning a Diversion
Money Diversion and El Tigre's Distraction

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Personal Vendetta Reveal
sub_scenes.description: A smaller man is interrogated about Rosita's location, leading to a personal vendetta against Axis agents being revealed.

narrative_arcs.title: Threat of Force for Rosita's Location

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Mission Mobilization and Execution
sub_scenes.description: A rescue mission is launched to save Rosita, leading to pursuit, infiltration, and confrontation with Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Climax of Rescue and Government Intervention
sub_scenes.description: The rescue culminates in a brawl, intervention by Rosita's maid, and the arrival of government troops, leading to victory.

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle: Sub Detector and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, his fight against a spy ring, and the retrieval of sub detector plans, complicated by betrayal and personal sacrifice.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Urgent Report
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan fights natives in the jungle, and an officer reports a grave matter to Captain Lawton.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Brawl with Devil Dog Dolan
Reporting a Grave Matter to Captain Lawton

sub_scenes.title: Disobedience and Jungle Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: An officer justifies disobeying orders to retrieve sub detector plans, and the 'leatherneck' infiltrates the jungle, facing a hidden threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival, Jungle Infiltration, and Hidden Threat

sub_scenes.title: Native Ambush and Mysterious Foresight
sub_scenes.description: The 'leatherneck' is ambushed by natives, while a separate scene hints at mysterious foresight related to 'marine fires'.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Interrogation, and Torture
sub_scenes.description: A native man is captured and interrogated by Dolan, while 'Sinister Grauer' orders the retrieval of the sub detector plans, leading to torture.

narrative_arcs.title: Capture and Initial Search of the Native Man
Preparation for Torture and Forced Compliance
Cooperation and Information Exchange with Foreign Agent

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Marine Attack, and Sam's Sacrifice
sub_scenes.description: Dolan confesses to arson, justifies it, initiates a marine 'attack', and faces personal loss with Sam's sacrifice.

narrative_arcs.title: Sam's Sacrifice and Dolan's Vengeful Resolve

sub_scenes.title: Combat, Chief's Defeat, and Native Homage
sub_scenes.description: Dolan fights natives, defeats their chief, and is surprisingly honored by them.

sub_scenes.title: Captain Grauer's Dilemma and Dolan's Reward
sub_scenes.description: Captain Grauer faces a dilemma due to his captured son, while Dolan is rewarded and then delivers unusual service discipline.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Reward and Service Spanking

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane, as they investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, uncovering a complex case involving racketeering, blood transfusions, and a community's response.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins and the Murder Case
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins story and their assignment to investigate the banker's murder.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story

sub_scenes.title: Police Station and Hospital Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Twins investigate at the police station and hospital, discovering Miss Reilly's illness and the need for a rare blood type.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly's Illness

sub_scenes.title: Racketeering Revelation and New Lead
sub_scenes.description: Twins decide to inform Elijah and a news broadcast reveals Farnacci's gang and motive, prompting a search for Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Inform Elijah and Phone Call

sub_scenes.title: Search for Reilly and Mrs. Murphy's House
sub_scenes.description: Twins search for Tom Reilly, asking locals and eventually reaching Mrs. Murphy's house.

sub_scenes.title: Revelation, Ambush, and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Mrs. Murphy reveals the reason for Tom Reilly's abduction, and twins are ambushed but manage to escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Mrs. Murphy's Revelation and the Ambush
Diane's Cab Chase and Irish Blockade
Irish Neighborhood Intervention and Police Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion Crisis
sub_scenes.description: Twins wait at the hospital for news, and a blood transfusion crisis arises due to a rare blood type.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Hospital and Anxious Wait
Urgent Need for Blood Transfusion and Initial Mismatch

sub_scenes.title: Community Blood Donation and Lassie's Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Community responds to the call for blood donation, enabling transfusion and setting up Lassie's recovery and a celebratory ending.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgent Call and Community Response for Blood Donors
Demand for Justice and Police Involvement
Police Raid and Confrontation at the Poolroom
